name: OpCheck
short_description:
Systems up?  Check.

Short for "Operations Checker," OpCheck is a proactive web application monitoring solution for cloud-based / online service providers.  It makes sure that your applications are up - and alerts you when they aren't.

OpCheck contains a robust scheduling engine that performs scans exactly when you need them, at any frequency you need them.

There are 3 scan types: Ping, TcpConnect, and HTTP.  The HTTP scan type is highly configurable and best illustrates the power and utility behind this product.

OpCheck's most powerful feature is the HTTP scan type.  It checks the availability, performance, and configuration of web applications.  It contains an extremely powerful HTTP request crafter that allows you to send any payload to the target web server - any combination of headers, cookies, and message body.  OpCheck also has a robust set of validator components that validate the response headers, cookies, and even run an XQuery against an XML  message body.
summary: A powerful, network & web application monitor.
